mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `narcissus_test`.`smart_device_v2` (`smart_device_ID`, `provider_code`, `threeID`, `smart_device_type`, `name`, `brand`, `connection_status_update_time`, `connection_status`, `work_status`, `created_at`, `created_by`, `updated_at`, `updated_by`, `deleted_at`, `deleted_by`, `house_catalog`, `apartment_ID`, `floor_ID`, `house_ID`, `room_ID`, `public_zone_ID`, `manage_status`) VALUES (#{smartWatermeterId}, #{manufactory}, #{uuid}, #{meterType}, 'shuidi', 'dding', now(), #{onoffStatus}, NULL, now(), #{createdBy}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{houseCatalog}, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{roomId}, NULL, '0');
mapper.update: UPDATE SET last_amount=#{amount},meter_updated_at= NOW() WHERE uuid = #{uuid};
UPDATE narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 SET connection_status = #{code} WHERE threeID = #{uuid};
mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS room_id,gb.smart_gateway_id,w.smart_watermeter_id,w.uuid,r.name AS room_name,CONCAT(h.area,h.building_num,"栋",h.unit_num,"单元",h.house_num) AS house_name,w.meter_type,w.created_at,w.last_amount,w.meter_amount,(w.price/100) AS price,w.onoff_status,g.sn FROM AS w INNER JOIN AS gb ON w.smart_watermeter_id = gb.smart_id INNER JOIN AS g ON g.smart_gateway_id = gb.smart_gateway_id INNER JOIN AS h ON w.house_id= h.id INNER JOIN AS r ON w.room_id= r.id AND h.id=r.house_id AND r.created_by_id = #{id} ;

SELECT sdv.connection_status connectionStatus,sgv.description ,sgv.smart_gateway_ID smartGatewayId,sdv.threeID uuid,a.name houseName,a.address,sgv.install_time createTime, sdv.connection_status_update_time updateTime,sdv.provider_code brand FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 sdv LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.public_zone pz ON pz.public_zone_ID=sdv.public_zone_ID LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.apartment a ON pz.parent_ID=a.id LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 sgv ON sgv.smart_gateway_ID=sdv.smart_device_ID WHERE sdv.smart_device_ID=#{id};

SELECT g.smart_gateway_id,g.uuid,CONCAT(h.area,h.building_num,"栋",h.unit_num,"单元",h.house_num) AS house_name,g.room_id,g.updated_at,g.created_at,g.brand FROM g LEFT JOIN AS h ON g.house_id =h.id WHERE smart_gateway_id = #{id};

SELECT gb.smart_gateway_id,w.smart_watermeter_id,r.name AS room_name,h.floor_num,CONCAT(h.area,h.building_num,"栋",h.unit_num,"单元",h.house_num) AS house_name,w.meter_type,w.created_at,w.last_amount,w.meter_amount,(w.price/100) AS price,w.onoff_status FROM AS w INNER JOIN AS gb ON w.smart_watermeter_id = gb.smart_id AND gb.smart_gateway_id = #{id} INNER JOIN AS h ON w.house_id= h.id INNER JOIN AS r ON w.room_id= r.id AND h.id=r.house_id;

SELECT r.name,sdv.`name` waterType,sdv.threeID uuid,sdv.connection_status connectionStatus FROM narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 sgbv LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 sdv ON sgbv.smart_device_ID=sdv.smart_device_ID LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room r ON r.id=sdv.room_ID WHERE sgbv.smart_gateway_ID=#{smartGatewayId} and sdv.manage_status=0

SELECT r.id AS room_id,w.uuid,a.name AS house_name,gb.smart_gateway_id,w.smart_watermeter_id,r.name AS room_name,w.meter_type,w.created_at,w.last_amount,w.meter_amount,(w.price/100) AS price,w.onoff_status,g.sn FROM AS w INNER JOIN AS gb ON w.smart_watermeter_id = gb.smart_id INNER JOIN AS g ON g.smart_gateway_id = gb.smart_gateway_id INNER JOIN AS f ON w.floor_id= f.id LEFT JOIN AS a ON w.apartment_id= a.id INNER JOIN AS r ON w.room_id= r.id AND f.id=r.floor_id AND f.id = #{id} ;

SELECT sdv.smart_device_ID smartGatewayId,sdv.threeID uuid,a.name houseName,sdv.connection_status onoffStatus,COUNT(sdv.smart_device_ID) watermeterNum,COUNT(sdv.connection_status=1) watermeterOnLineNum FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 sdv LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.public_zone pz on pz.public_zone_ID=sdv.public_zone_ID LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.apartment a ON a.id=pz.parent_ID LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 sgbv ON sgbv.smart_gateway_ID=sdv.smart_device_ID WHERE a.id= #{id} AND sdv.smart_device_type=5 AND sdv.manage_status=0

SELECT sgbv.smart_device_ID FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 sdv LEFT JOIN narcissus.public_zone pz on pz.public_zone_ID=sdv.public_zone_ID LEFT JOIN narcissus.smart_gateway_bind_v2 sgbv ON sgbv.smart_gateway_ID=sdv.smart_device_ID WHERE sgbv.smart_gateway_ID=#{gateWayId} AND sdv.smart_device_type=5 AND sdv.manage_status=0;
SELECT sdv.connection_status FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 sdv WHERE sdv.manage_status=0 AND sdv.smart_device_ID=#{id}
SELECT wr.created_at,wr.device_amount,wr.smart_watermeter_id FROM wr WHERE smart_watermeter_id = #{id} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT wr.created_at,wr.device_amount,wr.smart_watermeter_id FROM wr WHERE smart_watermeter_id = #{id} AND created_at between ADDDATE(#{startTime},-1) and #{endTime} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT smi.created_at createdAt,smi.exception_type exceptionType FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 sdv LEFT JOIN narcissus.smart_mistake_info smi ON smi.uuid=sdv.threeID WHERE sdv.smart_device_ID=#{watermeterId} AND smi.smart_device_type=5 GROUP BY smi.created_at DESC

SELECT COUNT(sdv.connection_status=1) FROM narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 sgvb LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 sdv ON sgvb.smart_device_ID=sdv.smart_device_ID WHERE sgvb.smart_gateway_ID=#{gateWayId} AND sdv.manage_status=0

SELECT smi.created_at createdAt,smi.exception_type exceptionType FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 sdv LEFT JOIN narcissus.smart_mistake_info smi ON smi.uuid=sdv.threeID WHERE sdv.smart_device_ID=#{gatewayId} AND smi.smart_device_type=5 GROUP BY smi.created_at DESC
SELECT watermeter.uuid,watermeter.manufactory FROM watermeter WHERE watermeter.smart_watermeter_id = #{id}
SELECT house.created_by_id FROM house WHERE house.id = #{id}
SELECT apartment.created_by FROM apartment WHERE apartment.id = #{id}

SELECT w.* FROM narcissus_test.smart_watermeter w JOIN narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 d ON w.smart_watermeter_id = d.smart_device_ID WHERE w.uuid=#{uuid} AND d.manage_status = 0 ORDER BY w.created_at DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM WHERE smart_watermeter_id=#{deviceId}
SELECT (last_amount-meter_amount) AS amount FROM smart_watermeter WHERE smart_watermeter.smart_watermeter_id = #{watermenterId}
SELECT uuid,manufactory FROM
SELECT meter_updated_at FROM WHERE uuid = #{uuid}

SELECT g.smart_gateway_id,g.uuid, COUNT(DISTINCT gb.smart_id) AS watermeter_num,SUM(case w.onoff_status when 1 then 1 else 0 end) AS watermeter_onoff_num FROM AS g LEFT JOIN AS gb ON g.smart_gateway_id=gb.smart_gateway_id LEFT JOIN AS w ON w.smart_watermeter_id=gb.smart_id WHERE g.created_by = #{id} AND g.house_catalog = 1 GROUP BY g.smart_gateway_id;
SELECT onoff_status FROM WHERE uuid = #{uuid}
SELECT smart_watermeter_id FROM
SELECT device_amount FROM WHERE TO_DAYS(created_at) =TO_DAYS(last_day(date_sub(now(),interval 1 month))) AND smart_watermeter_id = #{watermeterId}

SELECT sgbv.smart_device_ID FROM narcissus.smart_device_v2 sdv LEFT JOIN narcissus.smart_gateway_bind_v2 sgbv ON sgbv.smart_gateway_ID=sdv.smart_device_ID WHERE sdv.manage_status=0 AND sdv.smart_device_type=5 AND sdv.threeID=#{uuid}

SELECT DISTINCT a.id,a.name, 'apartment' AS `type` FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 d JOIN `volga_test`.room r ON d.room_ID = r.id JOIN `volga_test`.apartment a ON r.apartment_id = a.id WHERE d.created_by IN (#{userIds}) AND d.room_ID > 0 AND d.brand = #{brand} AND d.house_catalog = 0 AND d.smart_device_type IN (2,5) AND d.manage_status = 0 UNION SELECT DISTINCT a.id,a.name, 'apartment' AS `type` FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 d JOIN narcissus_test.public_zone p ON d.public_zone_ID = p.public_zone_ID JOIN `volga_test`.apartment a ON a.id = p.parent_ID WHERE d.created_by IN (#{userIds}) AND d.public_zone_ID > 0 AND d.brand = #{brand} AND p.data_type = 1 AND d.smart_device_type IN (2,5) AND d.manage_status = 0

SELECT a.id,a.`name`,f.id AS floorId,f.`name` AS floorName,COUNT(d.smart_device_ID) AS watermeterNum, SUM( CASE d.connection_status WHEN 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS watermeterOnLineNum FROM `volga_test`.apartment AS a LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.floor AS f ON f.apartment_id = a.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room AS r ON r.floor_id = f.id LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 AS d ON d.room_ID = r.id AND d.smart_device_type = 2 LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_watermeter AS w ON w.smart_watermeter_id = d.smart_device_ID WHERE a.id = #{apartmentId} AND d.manage_status = 0 GROUP BY f.id

SELECT r.id AS roomId,r.name AS roomName,a.balance/100 AS balance,d.smart_device_ID AS waterId,w.meter_type,w.meter_updated_at AS updateAt,w.last_amount-w.meter_amount AS currentAmount,d.connection_status AS onoff_status FROM `narcissus_test`.smart_device_v2 d LEFT JOIN `narcissus_test`.smart_watermeter w ON d.smart_device_ID = w.smart_watermeter_id LEFT JOIN `narcissus_test`.smart_watermeter_account a ON d.room_id = a.room_id AND d.house_catalog = a.house_catalog JOIN `volga_test`.room r ON r.id = d.room_ID JOIN `volga_test`.floor f ON f.id = r.floor_id WHERE f.id = #{floorId} AND d.smart_device_type = 2 AND d.manage_status = 0

SELECT d.smart_device_ID AS waterId, d.threeID AS waterUuid,w.meter_type AS meterType, w.meter_updated_at AS updateAt, w.last_amount - w.meter_amount AS currentAmount,w.price/100 AS price,w.onoff_status,gb.smart_gateway_ID,g.uuid AS gatewayUuId FROM narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 d JOIN narcissus_test.smart_watermeter w ON d.smart_device_ID = w.smart_watermeter_id JOIN narcissus_test.smart_gateway_bind_v2 gb ON d.smart_device_ID = gb.smart_device_ID LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_gateway_v2 g ON gb.smart_gateway_ID = g.smart_gateway_ID WHERE d.room_ID = #{roomId} AND d.manage_status = 0

SELECT r.`name` AS roomName, a.area AS apartmentName, rc.`status` AS contractStatus, rc.customer_name,rc.customer_phone,rc.start_time,a.balance/100 AS balance FROM `volga_test`.room r JOIN `volga_test`.apartment a ON r.apartment_id = a.id LEFT JOIN `volga_test`.room_contract rc ON rc.room_id = r.id AND rc.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN `narcissus_test`.smart_watermeter_account a ON r.id = a.room_id AND a.house_catalog = 0 WHERE r.id = #{roomId} ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT w.smart_watermeter_id, w.created_at, w.created_by, w.apartment_id, w.floor_id, w.house_id, w.room_id, w.house_catalog, w.meter_type, w.uuid, w.onoff_status, w.price, w.meter_amount, w.last_amount, w.meter_updated_at, w.manufactory FROM narcissus_test.smart_watermeter AS w WHERE w.smart_watermeter_id = #{waterId}

SELECT SUM(last_amount - meter_amount) AS used, d.room_id, d.house_catalog, w.meter_type, MAX(w.price) / 100 AS price,a.balance / 100 AS balance,w.updated_at, SUM(last_amount - meter_amount) * price / 100 AS amount FROM narcissus_test.smart_watermeter w JOIN narcissus_test.smart_device_v2 d ON w.smart_watermeter_id = d.smart_device_ID LEFT JOIN narcissus_test.smart_watermeter_account a ON a.room_id = d.room_ID AND a.house_catalog = d.house_catalog WHERE d.room_id = #{roomId} AND d.house_catalog = #{type} GROUP BY d.room_id, d.house_catalog, w.meter_type AND d.manage_status = 0
SELECT * FROM narcissus_test.smart_watermeter_account WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND house_catalog = #{houseCatalog}
mapper.update: UPDATE narcissus_test.smart_watermeter_account SET balance = #{balance} WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND house_catalog = #{houseCatalog}
